title: Odorant Level Check
description: A technician is dispatched to check that the correct amount of odorant (mercaptan) is being injected into the natural gas stream at a gate station.

tasks.description: Retrieve the required odorant injection rate based on the current gas flow rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician's mobile device displays the target injection rate.

tasks.description: Perform a sniff test at a downstream location to confirm the gas is adequately odorized.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician performs and logs the result of the sniff test.

tasks.description: Record the current odorant tank level and confirm the injection pump is working correctly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician logs the tank level and confirms the equipment is functioning as expected.
